lead_paragraph: "We've gone through seven races, and you can throw a blanket over the three of us," said Kevin Harvick after the race at Talladega Superspeedway on Sunday.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing

snippet: There were 87 lead changes at Talladega Superspeedway on Sunday, but the three leaders in the Chase remained close -- separated by only 38 points.

headline.main: Sprint Cup Chase Remains Tight After Talladega

abstract: There were 87 lead changes at Talladega Superspeedway on Sunday, but the three leaders in the Chase remained close -- separated by only 38 points.
